subject: Economy
question_en: What is Gross Domestic Product (GDP) and why is it important?
question_hi: ग्रॉस देश प्रेमी (GDP) क्या है और इसके बारे में क्या जानकारी क्या होती है?
A_en: GDP is the total value of goods and services produced within a country's borders in a specific time period. It is important because it measures a country's economic growth and development.
